class_description:
Unchecked exception thrown when the precision is a negative value other than
 -1, the conversion does not support a precision, or the value is
 otherwise unsupported.

Methods.method_description: Constructs an instance of this class with the specified precision.

return_description:
the detail message string of this Throwable instance
          (which may be null).

Methods.method_description: Returns the detail message string of this throwable.
